references.paper_title: Vision meets robotics: The kitti dataset
references.reason: This paper introduces the KITTI dataset, a widely used benchmark for 3D object detection, providing real-world images and 3D annotations.
This paper presents ShapeNet, a large-scale dataset of 3D models, enabling the generation of synthetic objects for data augmentation and providing a diverse source of 3D assets.

references.paper_title: Adding conditional control to text-to-image diffusion models
references.reason: This paper introduces ControlNet, a method for adding conditional control to text-to-image diffusion models, which is leveraged in this paper to generate realistic car versions from synthetic renderings.

references.paper_title: Nuscenes: A multimodal dataset for autonomous driving
references.reason: This paper introduces nuScenes, a large-scale multimodal dataset for autonomous driving, providing diverse and challenging scenarios for 3D object detection.

references.paper_title: Carla: An open urban driving simulator
references.reason: This paper introduces CARLA, an open-source urban driving simulator used for generating realistic scenes with multiple cars and diverse traffic scenarios.
